TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowControlClient extends System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1<class System.ServiceModel.Activities.IWorkflowInstanceManagement>

Docs.summary: Allows a client to send control operations to a workflow service hosted with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use this class to control a workflow instance.
